name: Mactabilis
description: Mactabilis is a modern shooter with rpg elements. Customize your ship, select from a large array of weapons or even create your own with the powerful in-game editor! Blast your way through vibrant, multi-level, adrenaline filled missions in search of loot and power.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsÂ® XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Video Card Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I really liked this game, it was giving a new spin to that kind of games. Alot of things can be customized weapons etc.  The dual layer of the levels were a thing that was funny to use to get by the ennemies.  Thumbs up !
